title: Linkin Park - Live in London (O2 Arena) 1-28-2008
description:
Here&#039;s the full digipak of night 1 of the 2 London O2 shows. I&#039;ll be uploading a torrent of the 2nd night later on today, however Smarky from the LPU has been kind enough to upload it in a 4shared directory already, so if you can&#039;t wait, grab it from there: http://www.4shared.com/dir/5597446/42906b2/sharing.html

Thanks to Dean for sending me these files!

Show notes from http://lplive.net:

London, England 
O2 Arena 
28th January 2008 

Setlist:
01. What I&#039;ve Done
02. Faint
03. No More Sorrow
04. Somewhere I Belong
05. Lying From You 
06. From The Inside 
07. Points Of Authority
08. Hands Held High 
09. Wake 
10. Given Up 
11. Valentine&#039;s Day 
12. Numb 
13. Umbrella (Rihanna cover)
14. Shadow Of The Day 
15. Crawling
16. In The End 
17. Bleed It Out
18. My December (Piano Version) 
19. Breaking The Habit 
20. A Place For My Head 
21. One Step Closer

Show Notes:
- &#039;Bloc Party&#039; was over &#039;Points Of Authority&#039;.
- Mike did a cover of Rihanna&#039;s &#039;Umbrella&#039; instead of the usual &#039;Just Like Heaven&#039; cover. He sang a small bit of the song and had the crowd help him out.
